issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw: The IHMC controller implements the ros_control interfaces and acts as a Gazebo plugin. This means that you won't see any connections going from the controller to Gazebo namespaces in something like rqt_graph. As for the IOExceptions, I believe those are originating in ROSJava. Did they occur spontaneously or were they triggered by some action?
content.html: The IHMC controller implements the ros_control interfaces and acts as a Gazebo plugin. This means that you won't see any connections going from the controller to Gazebo namespaces in something like rqt_graph. As for the IOExceptions, I believe those are originating in ROSJava. Did they occur spontaneously or were they triggered by some action?
